title: Did the person who died have assets in another name
question: Did {deceasedName} have assets in another name?
paragraph1: The grant of probate will list all names that you give us.
paragraph2: The person who died could have used their maiden name, a nickname, or a different spelling of their name for some of their assets. You may find it helpful to check any documents you have from the person who died, for example, bank statements, property deeds or records of any shares they held, to see if they used a different name.

alias.required: Answer ‘yes’ if the person who died had assets in another name
